member.name: D3D_PARAMETER_FLAGS
member.summary: Indicates semantic flags for function parameters.

member.name: D3D_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D_PF_NONE
member.summary: The parameter has no semantic flags.

member.name: D3D_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D_PF_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. This value is not used.
